Blog.post: SUMMER SUCKS BIG BOOTY!! Over the summer Ive had a lot of drama with my friends and then the friends that are still talking to my say theyre having drama with either thier friends or theyre boyfriends or whatever!! What is it about summer? Everyone likes to start crap with everyone then everyone gets hurt! I hope none of my friends are mad at me!! I love you guys!! Muahz!! I hope that I wont have ne more drama then Ive already have cause drama is just gay! Kaitlin ............. Mallory ............ Matt ........ Emily ............ Gary ........ I love you guys!! xoxoBIGKissesxoxo!! I hope we never fight and if we did I hope we never fight again!! U guys rock and u keep my life going!!! g2g adios my loves!!! x o x o A s H l E e x o x o

Hey babe!!! Sorry I accedently erased my other one......... dont ask how i have no clue lol!!!! Well ne ways!!! Im writing in here to tell everyone that I love Kaitlin!!!! Lol!! Kaitlin rules!!! Hey guys!!! Im sooo confused!!!! I like this guy and hes sooooooooooo hott!!!Grrrowl!! hehe! ButI havent talked to him in like forever but I still remember when we use to talk and stuff and I miss that!! My friend is suppose to tell him to IM me when he gets on the comp but Im not sure shes gonna!!! I dont want to tell my friend how I feel about him because shes really close to him and 1 she might tell him and I dont know if I want her to do that and 2 I dont feel like I can really talk to her about that kind of stuff cause I dont think she'll understand and I dk shes just not the kind of person u would talk to about ur love life I mean yea u can tell her ur going out with someone but u can really tell her that u still like someone or u miss someone or that u want tostart talking to ur ex again cause u kind of want to get back with him because if u do she'll probably just sit there and look at u like ur crazy or if ur on the phone or one the comp she'll just say something like ooooooooooook or somebodys lost it!!! At least all this is how I think she'll react but I dk cause sometime she act different and understand and stuff so I dk!!! Grrrrrrr why cant I just tell her how I feel and how she'll understand and not have to worry about it but noooooooooo I have to be to chicken to bring it up!!! What should I do guy?? Im so lost!!! xoxoxoAsHlEexoxoxo

Yo!!! Hehe!! Guys I feel really bad for my friend (lets just say her name is ketchup) Well ketchup is really in love with this guy names umm egg (hehe)latly their relashionship has been going down hill and I really feel bad for her!! Latly life for me and her have been confusing and horrible all at the same time! Shes in love with egg but not sure he feels the same for her, on the other hand Im scared to like a guy cause I dont want to get hurt or him just not feel the same for me!! Grrrrrrrrrr!! Life is soooooooo weird sometimes!! well if ne body out there has ne advice for me of ketchup please leave some messages please please please!!!!!!!!!! I g2g love ya all!!! BIG KISSES! MUAHZ!!

Hey guys!! Life still gos on for me! Hehe! Im sooooooooo bored Im talking to my friend tassie! Im so sad, she gonna move far, far away! We all need her silliness! Shes too silly for them to make her move!! Silliness over rules that planet!! haha jk u guys! ........................ when I talk to silly people it makes me all hyper and dor k y!!! Well g2g love ya all! Adios!! Were gonna miss u Tassie!! Big kisses! Muahz!

Hey ya'll!! Whats up? Im just chillin in my desk room typing!!!! Well latly I've been a little upset because my friend Marquis got mad at me and said I broke his heart (i dk why) then now he says that where cool but he doesnt talk to me and much and Melanee is mad at me cause she thinks Im a wigger but Im really not I just like to mess around with people then everyone in my family is always yelling at me for no reason and it kind of gets annoying!! But dont worry its allgood I'll get through it and everything will be just delightfull! Yea well this post kind of sounds really gay so Im gonna leave and write more lata! so adios! I love u all!!

I had a bad day today! ............... I found out that my grandpa might die soon! ...... Hes been sick for a looong time and I know it would probably just be best if he did but I dont wanna lose him cause hes still family and I love him .... He cant eat ne more he has to have his food through a tube thingy in his stomach (that he always takes out) and he can read and hes smart and stuff but he cant really pay attention or understand ne thing like he can talk to someone and have a conversaion he alwasy changes the subject every 5 minutes and he doesnt rememeber everyone and stuff like that and its horrible and my mom says that he might die soon and Im really mad (not just sad) about that because last year I had one person die in my family then after that her dad then her mom then my other grandma and Im scared that if one person dies again then a lot of people are gonna die I dont want another half of my family to leave me!! I already feel alone in my house (another story) and I dont want to feel even more lonely cause it really sucks!! I know it may be best if he gos but then again in my mind it wouldnt!
